channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: This satellite stock could benefit from a booming $200 billion opportunity
item.description: Wireless, broadband and defense markets are contributing to a huge opportunity for satellite companies focused on low-Earth altitudes, says BofA.

item.title: FedEx just gave investors a reason to be more optimistic

item.title: Is AMD in trouble as Nvidia and Intel pair up? Not so fast, analysts say.
item.description: Analysts note that even with Nvidia’s help, Intel has its challenges. And they see AMD as poised to benefit from an evolving AI landscape.

item.title: Cracker Barrel’s recovery may be ‘protracted,’ as younger diners stay away, analysts say
